<is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Display catalog item</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { if (current.inputs.catalog_item == "") { current.inputs.catalog_item = SCATFUtil.getLastUsedCatalogItemInTestBasedOnStep(current); if (!current.inputs.catalog_item) { if (current.step_config.category == '1d786c87c3b6220076173b0ac3d3ae16') gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("This step cannot be used before 'Open a Catalog Item' or 'Open a Record Producer' step. If contextual value has been used for 'Open a Catalog Item' or 'Open a Record Producer' in step before, set the 'Item' record in this step.")); else if (current.step_config.category == '01245d698713030070870cf888cb0bfb') gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("This step cannot be used before 'Open a Catalog Item(SP)', 'Open a Record Producer(SP)' or 'Open an Order Guide (SP)' step. If contextual value has been used for 'Open a Catalog Item(SP)', 'Open a Record Producer(SP)' or 'Open an Order Guide (SP)' in step before, set the 'Item' record in this step.")); } } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-11-18 09:31:06</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>17a6bf93c383220076173b0ac3d3ae49</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Display catalog item</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Automated Test Framework Service Catalog" source="com.glide.automated_testing_impl.service_catalog">838af86c3cf1311068bcf327dfe37fdc</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_17a6bf93c383220076173b0ac3d3ae49</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-13 18:14:10</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=17a6bf93c383220076173b0ac3d3ae49"/> </record_update>
